Dear {!Contact.FirstName},

-Track assets to prevent theft.
There is also a level of customization and flexibility to give you the program that fits your unique fleet.
When would be a good time to reach out to you?
Sincerely,
Brian Fitzpatrick WEX Telematics Service Phone: (847) 440-1724 Fax: (207) 791-1610 Email: bfitzpatrick@fleetlink.com http://www.wextelematics.com/
